basic_info.description: Hello! I'm Maria - a curious college student with the skills of a developer and the mindset of a human-centered designer. In addition to coding, I love being part of the design process as well - finding needs for users or clients, engaging in brainstorm sessions to try to come up with ideas to best suit them, and prototyping (whether it be physical, digital, or experiential) are all things I'm excited about! Thanks for checking out my website and feel free to see some of my projects below.

projects.title: Pine Beetle
projects.description: Worked as a developer for this tool, currently used by the USFS, which predicts Southern Pine Beetle outbreaks in the southern United States. Developed graph and map visualizations for historical outbreak data and predictoins.

projects.title: Bayes EM
projects.description: Worked as a UI/UX designer as part of a small project team at the Dartmouth DALI Lab. BayesEM is an app which uses Bayesian statistical analysis of past patient diagnosis data to assist doctors in making medical diagnosis.

projects.title: Rosebush
projects.description: Designed a mobile app to help users complete a 'Rose Bud Thorn' activity every day to help them practice finding gratitude and fulfillment. Designs done in a small project team using Figma. Part of Intro to UI/UX Design at Dartmouth College.
